subject: Football
Domestic Violence
lead_paragraph: Ray Rice, who was arrested and charged with assaulting his then-fiancée on Feb. 15, said his actions "were totally inexcusable" in his first public comments since receiving a two-game suspension.
snippet: Ray Rice, who was arrested and charged with assaulting his then-fiancée on Feb. 15, said his actions "were totally inexcusable" in his first public comments since receiving a two-game suspension.
